item.content:encoded:
• PC

New gameplay and news for Resident Evil Requiem incoming.

Capcom will host Resident Evil Showcase on January 15 at 2:00 p.m. PT / 5:00 p.m. ET / January 16 at 7:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, Japanese) and Twitch.

The broadcast will feature new gameplay and news for Resident Evil Requiem.

Resident Evil Requiem will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on February 27, 2026.

item.title: ANTHEM#9 launches February 5
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Gem-matching roguelite game dated.

Gem-matching roguelite game ANTHEM#9 will launch for PC via Steam on February 5 for 2,200 yen, publisher Shueisha Games and developer koeda announced. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Combine gems to form combos! In the strategic gem match roguelite ANTHEM#9, you’ll fight thrilling and puzzle-like combo battles. Assume the role of an agent of the secret organization known as ANTHEM#9 and confront powerful foes! Strategic deck construction is the key to unleashing lots of combos.

Match Three Colors of Gems to Form Massive Combos!

Match gems to activate skills and destroy foes with a flurry of combos!

Creating a deck that unleashes maximum damage and triggers high-speed combos within a limited time window is the key to victory.

ANTHEM#9 delivers strategic depth and a kinetic rush as a Gem-Match roguelite experience that’s both cerebral and thrilling.

Higher the Combo, the Greater the Thrill of Battle!

Match three colors of gems like in a match-three puzzle style game to activate powerful skills. Chain combos to ramp up damage—and satisfaction.

Choose the optimal order to trigger explosive sequences and crush bosses with style!

Trust Your Instincts and Aim for the Ultimate Deck!

In randomly generated dungeons, collect Attack Skills and “Blessings,” and build your deck that tips the scale of battle in your favor..

Customize which colored gems your skills require, fine-tune your strategy, and take down formidable foes as you climb deeper into the dungeon.

Setting

ANTHEM#9 is an international secret organization that seeks to maintain global stability through balance and harmony. Play as an agent of ANTHEM#9 and purge those who threaten the world’s balance.

Characters

  • Rubit – Our protagonist. An agent of ANTHEM#9. Her cunning combat style utilizes a dagger and poison skills. Rubit’s specialty lies in adaptability—by spending AP, she can change the color of her gems on the fly. Even when the board isn’t in her favor, she can recover from tight situations and keep the combos flowing.
  • Phannie – A hedonistic gambler. Uses a gun for his flashy and bold fighting style. He can spend AP to split double gems. Increasing his total gems synergizes perfectly with skills that trigger multiple times! With a high-risk high-reward approach, he can unleash massive combos that no other character could!
  • Beni – A martial artist who fights for the pride of her people. She’s a self-proclaimed hero! She can use AP to consume gems in exchange for Shield, healing, Attack buffs, and more. Her fighting style involves packing a lot into a single hit, and she can stack buffs to accomplish that or to give herself ironclad defense. Swearing to punish evil, she uses her overwhelming power to pursue justice!

About the Creator

A game creator who began working in 2021.

Has no experience in the industry and isn’t a programmer. But unable to give up on his dreams of game development, he picked up a beginner’s guide past the age of thirty and worked tirelessly. He didn’t know left from right, but he had the passion to keep going. He was also proactive about presenting at events.

His debut game, ANTHEM#9, received the grand prize in the Shueisha Game Creators Camp Game BBQ Vol. 2 No Demo Division.

item.title: ARC Raiders sales top 12 million
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

"Gilded Pickaxe" Raider Tool now available for a limited time.

Total sales for player-versus-player-versus-environment survival extraction shooter ARC Raiders have surpassed 12 million units, developer Embark Studios announced.

ARC Raiders launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on October 30, 2025, and surpassed four million sales in under two weeks.

“Reaching 12 million downloads is a milestone we owe entirely to the players,” said executive producer Aleksander Grondal in a press release. “The community of Raiders has helped shape this game from the very beginning, and their passion, feedback, and ingenuity continue to guide how we build, support, and grow this world for the long term.”

To celebrate the milestone, Embark Studios is offering the “Gilded Pickaxe” Raider Tool as a free-in-game reward for a limited time.

Ongoing updates for ARC Raiders will continue to “refine systems, strengthen the game’s foundation, and ensure the experience remains challenging, competitive, and rewarding for Raiders.” More information on future updates and new content will be announced in the months ahead.

item.title: Thief’s Roulette launches January 24
item.content:encoded:
• PC

First-person puzzle adventure game dated.

First-person puzzle adventure game Thief’s Roulette will launch for PC via Steam on January 24, developer hirogame announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Lady Luck has chosen 15 “thieves” to compete in Thief’s Roulette. A new world of puzzles and deception.

Story

You arrive in a strange place surrounded by unfamiliar faces. You and 14 others are made to compete in a series of challenges, hosted by a mysterious woman called Lady Luck. What is the goal of this ordeal? Why do you feel like merely an observer?

Lady Luck proclaims these 15 strangers to be “thieves,” and for that reason, she has brought them here to fight for their lives. To survive they must complete all of Lady Luck’s Challenges. Unravel the truth of Lady Luck’s game, and find your way out of this strange new world.

Gameplay

Thief’s Roulette is a first-person puzzle adventure game with a cryptic story to unravel. At the core of the game are a series of challenges conducted by Lady Luck. You will face a large variety of puzzles and obstacles as you make your way to the truth. Thief’s Roulette is not a traditional visual novel, but does feature visual novel-style cutscenes and conversations.

Key Features

  • A story of secrets and deception.
  • Unique and dynamic puzzles to solve.
  • First-person gameplay with fully explorable 3D escape rooms.
